author: Second Wind
description:
This video is brought to you by GameMaker, the free, fast, and easy-to-use 2D game engine that’s helped power modern classics like UFO 50, Antonblast, and Yahtzee’s Starstruck Vagabond – https://opr.as/SecondWind-3

This week on Hidden Gems, KC, Jess, and Jesse revisit Condemned: Criminal Origins -- https://store.steampowered.com/app/4720/Condemned_Criminal_Origins/

If you dig Hot Monday Energy, consider supporting us over on Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Check out some of our lovely merch over at our DFTBA store -- https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind

Get your Adventure is Nigh! plushies over at Shark Robot -- https://sharkrobot.com/collections/second-wind

Listen to the Hidden Gems songs here -- 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bUWISImXpRQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=szSjVtdyO6w
title: Revisiting the Horror of 2005's Condemned: Criminal Origins | Hidden Gems

author: Second Wind
description:
On this week’s episode of Windbreaker, Yahtzee, JM8, and Marty use the massive success of Clair Obscure: Expedition 33 as a jumping off point to discuss the current state of AA games.

If you dig the stuff we make, consider supporting us over at Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Grab yourself a "Let's All Laugh at an Industry..." shirt over at our DFTBA store -- https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind

Get your Adventure is Nigh! plushies over at Shark Robot -- https://sharkrobot.com/collections/second-wind
title: The Strange State of AA Games | Windbreaker Podcast
